alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 26 at 12:53PM MST until June 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Persist... .A prolonged period of windy conditions, combined with low teen to single digit RHs, will result in a multi day stretch of critical fire weather conditions. Conditions start today for areas along and north of the Mogollon Rim where the RFW is out. Strongest winds will be Tuesday and will occur at both higher and lower elevations, resulting in a widespread RFW that encompasses almost all of northern Arizona. Windy conditions will persist into Wednesday, but be shifting eastward. A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for Wednesday because of this. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING FOR FOR MUCH OF NORTHERN ARIZONA FROM THE MOGOLLON RIM NORTH AND NORTHEAST... ...A NEW RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON MDT/ TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ TUESDAY DUE TO STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR MOST OF NORTHERN ARIZONA... The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a Red Flag Warning due to strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM MST /noon MDT/ to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ Tuesday. * AFFECTED AREA...Locations near Fredonia, Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake, and Valle. This includes portions of the Coconino National Forest and Kaibab National Forest. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 4 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity can cause fire to rapidly grow in size and intensity before first responders can contain them.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring or are imminent. A combination of strong winds and low relative humidities can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please notify field crews of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau
